BE HUGE'' Dealers said that if exporters respect Alassane Ouattara 's call for an export ban, there will be less availability of cocoa on the international market, which could send cocoa prices rocketing. If it's enforced prices of cocoa will go through the roof, Gary Mead, analyst with the VM Group in London, said of Alassane Ouattara 's call.`` If he's serious, if they can enforce such a trade embargo, the disruption would be huge.''
